sentences.en: A major practice is to sluice through pipelines to settling pond.
sentences.cn: 较重要的方法是经过管道冲流到沉淀池.

sentences.en: A sluice or gate used to control a flow of water.
sentences.cn: 无力控制尿液流动、不知不觉的撒尿.

sentences.en: Also briefly described is the newly developed sluice fine screen.
sentences.cn: 对新研制的溜槽细筛设备作了简单介绍.

sentences.en: Analyze load behavior of sluice with method of - dimension - linearity finite - element method. 6.
sentences.cn: 采用 三维 非线性有限元的方法, 分析了流槽的受力性能.

sentences.en: Another sluice gate keeps floodwater out of the lake.
sentences.cn: 另一闸门使洪水致流入湖内.

sentences.en: As soon as the sluice gate was opened, the water surged in.
sentences.cn: 水闸门一开, 水便一下子涌了出来.

sentences.en: Convenience sluice gate rapidly, energy, fluid resistance small, you can always operate.
sentences.cn: 启闭方便迅速 、 省力 、 流体阻力小, 可以经常操作.

sentences.en: Culvert and sluice block and sluice water.
sentences.cn: 涵闸具有挡水、泄水的作用.

sentences.en: Experts believe that this sediment will build up behind the dam, with only an unproven system of sluice gates to release it.
sentences.cn: 专家认为泥沙将会在大坝后堆积，将仅经过一个未知的水闸系统排放。

sentences.en: Flood water is discharged through the sluice on the Three Gorges Dam on June 19, 2007.
sentences.cn: 2007年6月19日随着三峡大坝的泄洪, 滞留了多天的洪水倾泻而下.

sentences.en: In order to flush sediment through, project engineers have designeda series of openings known as sluice gates at the base of the dam.
sentences.cn: 为了让泥沙和水流一起通过大坝，工程的设计师们在大坝底部设计了一系列的水闸门。

sentences.en: Out of the sluice springs an exhaustible supply of water.
sentences.cn: 水从水闸中源源不断的涌出.

sentences.en: Out of the sluice springs an inexhaustible supply of water.
The sanitation worker has to sluice the steps down every day.
sentences.cn: 这个清洁工每天都用水清台阶.

sentences.en: They regulate the flow of water by the sluice gate.
sentences.cn: 他们用水闸门控制水的流量.

sentences.en: They sluice the streets down every morning.
sentences.cn: 他们每天早晨冲洗街道.

sentences.en: While we sluice, the manager played with a carved paper knife.
sentences.cn: 我们讲话时, 经理漫不经心地摆弄着一把雕花裁纸小刀.

sentences.en: Yu and his colleagues ar e dispatched to sluice gates during times of drought when the conservancy has to impose a potentially life-determining judgment on supplies.
sentences.cn: 在干旱季节，余和同事们会被派往水闸，此时水利委员会对水量供应做出的决策几乎生死攸关。

words.tran_cn: 洗涤；冲洗；鳞迭矿；水冲开挖；[矿业] 流槽选矿法
泄水；开闸放水；冲洗（sluice的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 水闸，（用水闸控制的）水，有闸人工水道，漂洗处
trans.tran_en: a passage for water to flow through, with a special gate which can be opened or closed to control it

trans.tran_cn: 冲洗，（指水）喷涌而出，漂净，给…安装水闸
